医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
突破性药物改善了小鼠髓母细胞瘤的治疗脑癌是发达国家儿童死亡的第二大原因。对于生存的孩子，标准治疗对他们的发展和生活质量产生了长期影响，尤其是在小孩和婴儿中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/breakthrough-drug-rug-improves-treatment-of-medulloblastoma-in-in-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/breakthrough-drug-drug-improves-treatment-of-medulloblastoma-in-in-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3673A585-AD9D-467B-8798-3F23179E054E Tue, 04 Feb 2025 13:21:44 -0500 Breakthrough drug improves treatment of medulloblastoma in mice
局部ABT-263治疗可改善衰老皮肤的伤口愈合衰老（老年US）于2024年12月3日发表了一份新的研究论文，该论文在第17卷，第1期，标题为“局部ABT-263治疗可减少衰老的皮肤衰老并改善随后的伤口愈合”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/topical-abt-263-treatment-wartment-reatment-reatment-mproves-wound-healing-healing-ingaging-skin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/topical-abt-263-treatment-woreatment-reatment-reatment-reatment-wound-healing-healing-ingaging-ingaging-skin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=304CBCE6-BA59-43D3-9868-4CD4DDDCAA9AD Tue, 04 Feb 2025 13:12:46 -0500 Topical ABT-263 treatment improves wound healing in aging skin
SARS-COV-2感染与冠状动脉快速斑块生长有关一项新的研究发现，严重的急性呼吸道综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-COV-2）感染与冠状动脉中斑块的快速生长有关，心血管事件的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/sars-cov-2-infection-linked-to-rinked-to-rapid-plaque-plaque-rowth-in-cororonary-arteries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/sars-cov-2-infection-linked-to-rapid-plaque-plaque-in-coronary-arteries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b386fc7f-5f-5f-5f-5f-4f97-9272-5cf54f54fc4e321 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 13:08:24 -0500 SARS-CoV-2 infection linked to rapid plaque growth in coronary arteries
Kerry Ressler博士揭示的对PTSD的遗传建筑的新见解麦克莱恩医院首席科学官，哈佛医学院的精神病学教授克里·雷斯勒（Kerry Ressler）博士在一项全面的基因组媒体访谈中，揭示了理解创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）和相关焦虑症的神经生物学基础的突破性进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/new-insights-into-ptsds-genetic-genetic-architecture-unveiled-unveiled-by-dr-kerry-ressler.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/new-insights-into-ptsds-genetic-genetic-genetic-architecture-unveiled-unveiled-by-dr-kerry-ressler-ressler.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=086f2648-b513-4825-4825-af3e-faeef6250b15 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 12:16:16 -0500 New insights into PTSD's genetic architecture unveiled by Dr. Kerry Ressler
哮喘和抗生素使用增加了修订鼻窦手术的可能性如果患者在初次手术时患有哮喘或正在使用抗生素，则包括鼻息鼻窦手术（包括去除鼻息）的可能性更高。然而，根据一项新研究，更高的年龄并不是修订手术的预测指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/asthma-and-andibiotic-use-increase-the-likelihood-the-likelihood-of-revision-sinus-surogery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/asthma-and-andibiotic-use-increase-the-likelihood-the-likelihood-of-revision-sinus-sinus-surogery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30FFA462-5A0A-44F7-44F7-AE6E-99D91A77721F8 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 12:10:00 -0500 Asthma and antibiotic use increase the likelihood of revision sinus surgery
NTU分拆与Osler Group一起提供早期痴呆检测工具新加坡Nanyang Technological University（NTU新加坡）衍生公司Gray Matter Solutions与新加坡的高级健康和保健组织Osler Group合作，提供了一种新的筛查工具，可检测到轻度认知障碍（MCI） - 前阶段的早期阶段 - 痴呆症 - 有效且经济地使用人工智能（AI）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/ntu-pin-pin-fin-teams-up-with-osler-group-to-to-tofer-tofer-early-early-Dementia-detection-detection-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/ntu-pin-pin-fin-teams-up-with-osler-group-to-to-fer--------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6E21C76A-32B8-45B6-B7E7-CB94614151F5 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 12:04:00 -0500 NTU spin-off teams up with Osler Group to offer early dementia detection tool
孕产妇的压力可能会在某些胎盘基因上留下表观遗传标记如欧洲神经心理药理学杂志上发表的一篇论文所述，孕产妇的压力可能会给与皮质醇相关的基因的表观遗传烙印 - 这是胎儿发育的必要激素 - 这将影响婴儿的发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/maternal-stress-may-leave-pepigenetic-marks-on-cinter-placestar-placeNt-placeNtal-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/maternal-stress-may-leave-pepigenetic-marks-on-cnern-placentil-placental-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b41b3d3-376c-415E-92B4-38C514961BEF Tue, 04 Feb 2025 11:43:00 -0500 Maternal stress may leave epigenetic marks on certain placental genes
溜溜球节食发现1型糖尿病患者会伤害肾脏健康根据一项新的研究发表在内分泌学会的临床内分泌与代谢杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/yo-yo-yo-dieting-found-to-harm-kidney-health-health-inty-type-1-diabetes-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/yo-yo-yo-dieting-found-to-harm-kidney-health-health-inty-type-1-diape-1-diabetes-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fec82d82d82-96d5-44ca-b968-b968-b10c867bf1db Tue, 04 Feb 2025 11:36:53 -0500 Yo-yo dieting found to harm kidney health in type 1 diabetes patients
肥胖症患者发现的GLP-1激动剂的高终止率肥胖症中GLP-1受体激动剂的中断是常见的，这是由体重恢复和社会经济因素驱动的，从而影响了治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/high-discontinuation-rates-of-glp-1-agonists-found-mong-mong-patients-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/high-discontinuation-rates-of-glp-1-agonists-found-found-mong-patients-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4dc3831-84ad-45d2-98d6-52931a8e6333 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 11:24:00 -0500 High discontinuation rates of GLP-1 agonists found among patients with obesity
设计的脂肪细胞饥饿肿瘤并预防癌症生长科学家将能量存储的白脂肪细胞转变为燃烧卡路里的“米色”脂肪。一旦植入，他们就会占据资源的肿瘤，在实验室实验中击败了五种不同类型的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/ deangineered-fat-cells-starve-tarve-tumors-and-pumors-and-prevent-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/发动机fat-fat-cells-starve-tumors-and-pumors-and-prevent-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9405693E-69E6-438A-820B-27342004F4C6 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 08:47:00 -0500 Engineered fat cells starve tumors and prevent cancer growth
